summary: Iteration 38 - uPort and uGrat fields in weekly summary tested successfully. Both fields are correctly displayed in the table header, in the Receitas dashboard card, in the data cells for each motorista, and in edit mode inputs. Backend API returns uber_portagens and uber_gratificacoes fields correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Code review passed: uPort and uGrat columns correctly added to table header (lines 1506-1507 in ResumoSemanalParceiro.js)
Code review passed: uPort and uGrat inputs in edit mode with proper titles (lines 1544-1545)
Code review passed: uPort and uGrat data cells display correctly (lines 1556-1557)
Code review passed: Receitas dashboard card shows uPort and uGrat totals (lines 1215-1220)
Code review passed: editForm state correctly includes uber_portagens and uber_gratificacoes (lines 509-510)
Code review passed: Backend API returns uber_portagens and uber_gratificacoes in motoristas array and totais object (relatorios.py lines 1281-1282, 1321-1322)
context_for_next_testing_agent: uPort and uGrat fields fully implemented and working. Values display as 0.00€ when no Uber portagens/gratificações data is available. Edit mode inputs are working with correct title attributes for tooltips.
passed_tests: API GET /api/relatorios/parceiro/resumo-semanal returns uber_portagens and uber_gratificacoes in totais - PASS
API GET /api/relatorios/parceiro/resumo-semanal returns uber_portagens and uber_gratificacoes for each motorista - PASS
Frontend: Table header shows 'uPort' column - PASS
Frontend: Table header shows 'uGrat' column - PASS
Frontend: Receitas card shows '↳ uPort' row - PASS
Frontend: Receitas card shows '↳ uGrat' row - PASS
Frontend: Edit mode shows input for uber_portagens with title 'uPort - Portagens Uber' - PASS
Frontend: Edit mode shows input for uber_gratificacoes with title 'uGrat - Gratificações Uber' - PASS
Frontend: Data cells display uPort values in amber color - PASS
Frontend: Data cells display uGrat values in purple color - PASS
Frontend: TOTAIS row shows total_uber_portagens and total_uber_gratificacoes - PASS

uPort_column.description: Column for Uber portagens (toll reimbursements) - displays in table and Receitas dashboard

uGrat_column.description: Column for Uber gratificações (tips/bonuses) - displays in table and Receitas dashboard

edit_mode.description: Both uber_portagens and uber_gratificacoes can be edited inline with tooltips
